title: Kannamma Lyrics Ko 2 Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Ko 2 Kannama Song Lyrics
Singers: Chinmayi, Inno Genga
Music: Leon James
Lyrics: Na Muthukumar

Baby Baby you are driving me crazy..
Baby Baby you still amaze me..

Mazhaya illa veyyila
Un paarvai vaanavillaa
Yaadhum vizhundhuvidum valayaa
Mudhalaa illa mudivaa
Un paarvai neelum kadhayaa
Naalum thondanthu varum alaiyaa

Un paarvai penna inbamaa
Naan virumbum valiyaa
Un paarvai uyirai kollumaa
porkalamaa

Nee paarka adadaa adadaa
Ayaayoo adadaa adadaa
Naan uraikiren
Mezhukaipol mella karaikiren

Nee paarka adadaa adadaa
Ayaayoo adadaa adadaa
Naan irakiren
Marupadi adi pirakiren

Baby Baby you are driving me crazy..
Baby Baby you still amaze me..

Baby Baby you are driving me crazy..
Baby Baby dont you leave me..

Un oru paarvai
Pala vaarthai sollu
Mounangalaal edhai solla
Iru vizhiyin mozhi podhum

Anbe manam pesa
Mozhigal yedharku
kai viralgal korkayile
En kaadhal nee arivaai
Anbe!!!

Nee paarka adadaa adadaa
Ayaayoo adadaa adadaa
Naan uraikiren
Mezhukaipol mella karaikiren

Nee paarka adadaa adadaa
Ayaayoo adadaa adadaa
Naan irakiren
Marupadi adi pirakiren

Un paarvai penna inbamaa

Un paarvai uyirai kollumaa
porkalamaa

Ayaayoo adadaa adadaa

Mezhukaipol mella karaikiren

Ayaayoo adadaa adadaa
